thread.section_title: IGO-POST Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of IGO-POST | igopost.ie
thread.title: Miss Diana C.
thread.title_full: IGO-POST reviewed by Miss Diana C.

author: Miss Diana C.
title: Miss Diana C.
text: Was on a short deadline, ordered 100 personalised water bottles for a company event. The team helped me step by step, accelerated the process and exceeded all our expectations with the quality of service (and a great price!), but also with these bottles that everyone admires (and some asked for the reference of :). Complete happiness.
